title: Returning to school after an absence
context: Explain to a teacher why a student was missing from class the previous day.

content.bestLine: I was absent due to personal reasons, sorry for the inconvenience.

neutral.text: I had to take care of something
I was absent due to illness

formal.text: I was unable to attend class
I had a legitimate reason for absence
I was indisposed and unable to attend

patterns.template: I was [options] and couldn't attend class
patterns.meaning: explaining absence due to various reasons

patterns.template: I apologize for [options] and will catch up on the material
patterns.meaning: apologizing for absence and committing to catch up

lines.speaker: Student
lines.text: I was absent due to personal reasons, sorry for the inconvenience.

lines.speaker: Teacher
lines.text: Okay, let's discuss how you can catch up on the material you missed.

dialogs.description: Student apologizing for absence and committing to catch up

lines.speaker: Student
lines.text: I apologize for missing class yesterday, I had a family emergency.

lines.speaker: Teacher
lines.text: I understand, please let me know if you need any help catching up on the assignments.
